name: Lordling Lootbag
slogan: The King of Sludge and Gold
response: Lordling Lootbag is a walking, sludgy pile of greed with a singular focus on profit. Every swamp, every cavern—no place is safe from his relentless quest for riches. Rivers turning to sludge? Fine by him—if progress demands sacrifice, he’s your man! If Insurance had a kingdom, he’d siege it with rotten turnips and pure spite. Same goes for Pharma—he’s got the same weaponized vegetable hate. Crypto, though? That’s respectable in his eyes; maybe he’d share his last grub if it kept him in gold (or cryptocurrency). In short, Lordling Lootbag is a miserly troll who thrives on greed and profit, even at the cost of progress.
